scripts.ci:test: npm run lint && npm run truffle:compile && npm run truffle:migrate && npm run truffle:test && mocha --recursive ./tests
scripts.test: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose run test_runner
scripts.truffle:compile: cd blockchain/ && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle compile --network development_geth && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle compile --network development_matic
scripts.truffle:test: cd blockchain/ && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle test --network development_geth && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle test --network development_matic
scripts.truffle:migrate: cd blockchain/ && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle migrate --network development_geth && ../node_modules/.bin/truffle migrate --network development_matic
